title: Sherlock fandom, say hello to 'The Abominable Bride'
text:
Benedict Cumberbatch and Martin Freeman (Image Credit - Official Twitter account of Sherlock) Sherlock fandom should get out of hiatus now and start looking forward to the one-off special. Because the showrunners have just announced the broadcast date. Here we go Sherlockians, we will bring in the new year with Sherlock in the Victorian era as BBC and Hartswood film will air the show on January 1, 2016.
Writer and producer Steven Moffat, Mark Gatiss, and Sue Vertue, accompanied by Amanda Abbington were the panel members for Sherlock at MCM London Comic Con. The Powers That Be (Read Moffat and Gatiss) also revealed the title of the one of Special. Hold your breath - It's 'The Abominable Bride.' I am calling 'The Blue Carbuncle' is being brought back. (We will get to the theories later)
That's not all. Showrunners know how they put us through the excruciating hiatus. So, to soothe those wounds they also unveiled four promotional images from 'The Abominable Bride.'
Get ready to meet The Abominable Bride – airing on 1st January 2016 #221Back #Sherlock #shspesh pic.twitter.com/y1ltJAbfFd
— Sherlock (@Sherlock221B) October 24, 2015
One image not enough? Here’s three more from The Abominable Bride to whet your appetites… #221Back #Sherlock pic.twitter.com/BiGvLKQfRA
— Sherlock (@Sherlock221B) October 24, 2015
In the posters, one can see Martin Freeman and Benedict Cumberbatch look suave in Victorian attires. The Violin is back and so is Watson's moustache. Sue Vertue also told the crowd that season four of Sherlock in modern times will start shooting in spring of 2016 and that Steven Moffat and Mark Gatiss are busy writing the scripts for the same.
'The Abominable Bride' will be broadcasted in UK and US at the same time. It will also be shown in select cinemas booking for which will start from November 2.
When asked to give details about the episode, Mark Gatiss replied that the special is very much in the same style and humour as the modern time Sherlock . We have two more months of hiatus. We have new images and some information.
Do I hear keys typing fanfiction and pencils drawing fanart? Let's get to it people!
